code: import axios from"axios";import React,{useCallback,useEffect,useState}from"react";import loadingGif from"../assets/loading.gif";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const fetchData=useCallback(async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts");setPosts(response.data);}catch(error){console.log(error);}},[]);useEffect(()=>{setTimeout(()=>{fetchData();setLoading(false);},1000);},[fetchData]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home",children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:loadingGif,alt:"not available"})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"posts animate__animated animate__backInLeft ",children:posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:post.body})]},post.id))})});};export default Home;
